ProductInfo.Features:
Covert DVR Disguised as an Alarm Clock; Fully Functional Alarm Clock
Motion Activated Recording; High Quality MPEG-4 Compression; 24 Hour Scheduled Recording
Record over a month of Footage with the included 2GB SD card; 24/7 Lifetime Live Customer Support
Easily Connect to a TV or Monitor; Compatible with High Capacity SD Memory Cards up to 32GB
This bundle includes a Defender complete alarm clock camera system & a bonus 8GB SD card
ProductInfo.Name: Defender ST300-SD Covert Alarm Clock DVR with Built-in Color Pinhole Surveillance Spy Camera and Bonus 8GB SD Card
